attributes.action: Stop Ms C O'Quigley from being the Chief Villain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
She has become the arch enemy of Dr E, Ms C O'Quigley routinely hatches schemes to terrorize Dr E who was once a gentle fun loving person but sadly has been turned into a paranoid hyper sensitive wreck.
Ms O'Quigley doesn't even have a cat or a side kick!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
